   Broadway Cast Honors Robin Williams in a Special Way [VIDEO]

  <meta content="Broadway's cast of Aladdin never fails to please a crowd, always full of spontaneity and excitement. In August of 2014, the cast made the decision to pay homage to a monumental entertainer who passed that year.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
James Monroe Iglehart and the Aladdin cast led the audience in an auditorium-wide performance of &quot;Never Had A Friend Like Me&quot; in honor of Robin Williams. Both the cast and audience clearly enjoyed the amiable celebration of the life of Robin Williams." name="description"/>
  <meta content="videos, clips" name="keywords"/>
  <meta content="global" name="distribution"/>
  <meta content="Videos, Stories" name="classification"/>
  <meta content="Wimp.com" name="copyright"/>
  <meta content="Broadway Cast Honors Robin Williams in a Special Way" property="og:title"/>
  <meta content="article" property="og:type"/>

  <meta content="590458081026489" property="fb:app_id"/>
  <meta content="Broadway's cast of Aladdin never fails to please a crowd, always full of spontaneity and excitement. In August of 2014, the cast made the decision to pay homage to a monumental entertainer who passed that year.

James Monroe Iglehart and the Aladdin cast led the audience in an auditorium-wide performance of &quot;Never Had A Friend Like Me&quot; in honor of Robin Williams. Both the cast and audience clearly enjoyed the amiable celebration of the life of Robin Williams." property="og:description"/>
  <link href="http://www.wimp.com/broadwayhonors/" rel="canonical"/>

   .embed-container {
    position: relative !important;
    padding-bottom: 56.25% !important;
   /* padding-top: 30px !important;*/ height: 0 !important; overflow: hidden !important;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.embed-container iframe,
.embed-container object,
.embed-container embed {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;

  <script type="text/javascript">
   function showHide(shID) {
   if (document.getElementById(shID)) {
      if (document.getElementById(shID+'-information').style.display != 'none') {
         document.getElementById(shID+'-information').style.display = 'none';
         document.getElementById(shID).style.display = 'block';
      }
      else {
         document.getElementById(shID+'-information').style.display = 'inline';
         document.getElementById(shID).style.display = 'none';
      }
   }
}

function showHide2(shID){
    $('#'+shID).toggle();
}
  </script>

     <div class="player-wrapper">
      <!-- Video Player -->
      <div id="player">
       <style>
        #gv-iframe { width: 100% !important;}
       </style>
       <script>
        var tag = document.createElement('script');

      tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
      var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);

      var player;
      function onYouTubeIframeAPIReady() {
        player = new YT.Player('player', {
          height: '100%',
          width: '100%',
          videoId: '-XiooG_Zrmc',
          playerVars: { 'iv_load_policy':3,'autoplay':0,'rel':0,'modestbranding':0,'showinfo':0,'enablejsapi':1,'cc_load_policy':0 },
          events: {
            'onReady': onPlayerReady,
            'onStateChange': onPlayerStateChange,
 	    'onError': onErrorEvent
          }
        });
      }
        function onErrorEvent(event) {
        var errCode = event.data;
         _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Video unable to play Error:', 'URL:http://www.wimp.com/performance/broadwayhonors/']);


        }

     function onPlayerReady(event) {
		event.target.playVideo();
      }

      function onPlayerStateChange(event) {


        if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.ENDED) {

                                        $('#recommended-videos').fadeIn(200);
                                        $('#recommended-videos').css( "height", "100%" );
                                        $('#replay').show();
                                        if (popup_cookie !== 'hide') {
                                                window.setInterval(function () {
                                                  $('#facebook-popup').removeClass('hide');
                                                  $('#side-popup').removeClass('hide');
                                                  //$('#modal-popup').removeClass('hide');
                                                }, 100000);
                                        }
                                        if (typeof rec_slider != 'undefined') {
                                                rec_slider.reloadSlider();
                                        }

        }


      }

function resumeVideo(){

        $('#recommended-videos').fadeOut(200);
        $('#replay').hide();
        player.playVideo();
        _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Video Replay', 'desktop']);
}
       </script>
      </div>

      </a>
      <a class="linkedin" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&amp;url=http://www.wimp.com/broadwayhonors/&amp;title=Broadway Cast Honors Robin Williams In A Special Way&amp;summary=Broadway's cast of Aladdin never fails to please a crowd, always full of spontaneity and excitement. In August of 2014, the cast made the decision to pay homage to a monumental entertainer who passed that year.%0D%0A
%0D%0A
James Monroe Iglehart and the Aladdin cast led the audience in an auditorium-wide performance of &quot;Never Had A Friend Like Me&quot; in honor of Robin Williams. Both the cast and audience clearly enjoyed the amiable celebration of the life of Robin Williams.%0D%0Ahttp://www.wimp.com/broadwayhonors/&amp;source=wimp.com" onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Share on Linkedin', 'desktop']); window.open (this.href, 'child', 'height=400,width=665,scrollbars'); return false" title="LinkedIn">
       Linkedin
      </a>
     </div>
     <!-- Get FB like and share count -->
     <script>
      $.ajax({
                  type: 'GET',
                  url: 'https://graph.facebook.com/fql?q=SELECT%20total_count%20FROM%20link_stat%20WHERE%20url="http://www.wimp.com/broadwayhonors/"',
                  success: function(data) {
                    showCount(data);
                  }
                });

                function formatNumber(num) {
                    return num &gt; 999 ? (num/1000).toFixed(1) + 'K' : num
                }

                function showCount(responseText) {
                  // Save the parsed JSON
                  var json = responseText;

                  // Check if the response contains a 'shares' property
                  // If it doesn't, we can just exit this function
                  if( typeof json.data[0].total_count == 'undefined' || json.data[0].total_count == 0)
                    return;

                  // A shares property and value must exist, update
                  // the span element with the share count
                  var count = formatNumber(json.data[0].total_count);
                  $('.fb-share-count').html("&lt;img src=\"/images/v3/arrow-white.png\"&gt;"+count);
                 $('.fb-share-count').show();
                }
     </script>
     <p class="video-desc">
      <img src="http://garak.wimp.com/images/thumbs/2015/01/93379f25705f4b0e6dcf7bce45f25b14_aladdintribute_506_332.jpg" style="display:none;"/>
      Broadway's cast of Aladdin never fails to please a crowd, always full of spontaneity and excitement. In August of 2014, the cast made the decision to pay homage to a monumental entertainer who passed that year.
      <br/>
      <br/>
      James Monroe Iglehart and the Aladdin cast led the audience in an auditorium-wide performance of "Never Had A Friend Like Me" in honor of Robin Williams. Both the cast and audience clearly enjoyed the amiable celebration of the life of Robin Williams.
     </p>
     <!-- More Information -->
     <div id="more-info">
      More Information:
      <input id="url" name="url" onclick="SelectAll('url');" readonly="readonly" size="61" type="text" value="http://www.youtube.com/user/DisneyOnBroadway/videos"/>
     </div>
     <div class="rev-headline">
      From Around the Web
     </div>

      (function() {

rcel.id = 'rc_' + Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000);

rcel.src = "http://trends.revcontent.com/serve.js.php?w=56&amp;t="+rcel.id+"&amp;c="+(new Date()).getTime()+"&amp;width="+(window.outerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth);
rcel.async = true;
var rcds = document.getElementById("rcjsload_62f013"); rcds.appendChild(rcel);
})();
     </script>

        var disqus_url = 'http://www.wimp.com/broadwayhonors/';

            var dsq = document.createElement('script'); dsq.type = 'text/javascript'; dsq.async = true;
            dsq.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';

         </h2>
        </div>

    <div class="close">
     <a href="#close" id="close_popup">
      <img src="http://www.wimp.com/images/close-popup.png"/>
     </a>
     <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function(){
                        $("#close_popup").click(function(e){
                                e.preventDefault();
                                $("#modal-popup").hide();
                                $("#modal-popup").addClass("hide");
                        });
                });
     </script>
    </div>
    <div class="text-center" id="modal-popup-wrap">
